entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
